EmailTemplate.description: Email to send when you can't reach a customer (2nd time)
EmailTemplate.name: Contact Attempted 2 (old)
EmailTemplate.subject: POD Point - Missed a call from us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We tried to contact you
We’d love to chat
Hi {!Account.Name},
Sorry I couldn’t get hold of you just now, but I hope that the information I sent through before has helped you on your way to finding the perfect home charging point for you.
If you have any more questions, just let me know and I’ll walk you through anything that’s not clear. Ready to get charging? Simply click below to get set up.
{!Opportunity.Ordering_Tool_Customer_URL__c}
Kind Regards,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} 020 7247 4114
